compilation of noteable submissions to the Afternoon Four Seasons Awards from 1987 to 2000 from major artists from when they were still newcomers.\n\n**Note:** Do not confuse this for the [Afternoon Four Seasons Awards CHRONICLE 1987-2000 Selections](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000000684) from 2013, which cut 23 of the 48 oneshots but still spread the remaining 25 across 4 seasonal volumes.\n\n**Chapters:**\n\n**Spring:**\n1​. Toyoda Minoru - Love Roma (2002 Spring Four Seasons Grand Prize)\n\n**Selected Descriptions:**\n\nKio Shimoku - Ten no Ryouiki\nA brief insight into the life of a young graduate student looking for work who finds himself in bed with a mysterious girl he has never seen before.\n\nAbe Yoshitoshi - Ame no Furu Basho\nEshikawa is a man who has lost sight of his life and stumbles through it, with no clear meaning or purpose. One day, he is informed that his ex-girlfriend committed suicide, which sets his brain on retrospect mode. He goes on a journey of self-revelation and contemplates upon the myriad of human emotions, the joys and sorrows of normalcy.\n\nKiba Kouichi - JAGUAR\nAs a woman is returning home one night, she runs into a man who was just in a car crash. As he's dying, he asks her to throw a certain package into the sea.\n\nHayashida Q - Sofa-chan\nHayashida Q's debut work about a female couch spirit.\n___\n**See Also:**\n- [MDList of Afternoon Four Seasons Award–winning oneshots](https://mangadex.org/list/d7b883be-732f-4d5b-8d92-818fa3c62555/afternoon-oneshot-four-seasons-award-winners)\n- [blog post covering this series](http://sportable.seesaa.net/article/246888518.html)\n- [Wikipedia article about this series](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%A2%E3%83%95%E3%82%BF%E3%83%8C%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E5%9B%9B%E5%AD%A3%E8%B3%9ECHRONICLE)\n- [Wikipedia article about the contest, including a list of winners](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%A2%E3%83%95%E3%82%BF%E3%83%8C%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E5%9B%9B%E5%AD%A3%E8%B3%9E)"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

1506258a-071a-45e2-9b25-06688a1bc1a4:::||@!@||:::2024-04-29T01:16:04:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1506258a-071a-45e2-9b25-06688a1bc1a4","title":{"en":"Tensei Ryoushu no Meiwaku Seigi"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"転生領主の迷惑性技 ～エロスの概念がない世界で現代の知識を使ってみたら～"}],"description":{"ja":"28歳にして領地を治める領主“デズモンド・ダムウィード”は、ある日、自分が転生者であることを突然思い出す。異世界転生といえばチート・ハーレム・無双！と意気揚々していた彼に待ち受けていたのは、この世界にはエロスの概念自体がないという事実だった。この世界のセックスは「ローション塗って挿入して即ビュッ…」で終わり――。性感や性欲すら存在せず、魔法のローションを塗り込むことで男性器は自動的に勃起する仕様だった。そんな世界にデズモンドは落胆するが、童貞であった前世の知識を活用すれば、この世界を性愛術で無双できるのではないかと思い立つ。そしてまずは自分の不仲な嫁、“シャーロット”に夜這いしようとするが……。3秒セックスの世界で、現代の童貞が“性愛”を説く！？"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0D1TB13NT","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/826451","raw":"https://comic-ragchew.jp/comics/seigi"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
bb7f866e-82a2-4244-8e97-214a41556350:::||@!@||:::2024-04-29T01:16:04:::||@!@||:::{"id":"bb7f866e-82a2-4244-8e97-214a41556350","title":{"en":"Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"能あるオーガは角を隠す"},{"ja-ro":"Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno wo Kakusu"},{"en":"A Talented Ogre Hides Its Horn"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id","en"],"description":{"en":"A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. \n\nSixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. And it is not the only one in this situation: its road crosses that one Other players who are victims of the same problem. For these Outlaw Players, game over is not an option. Whatever the cause of the bug, Sakuu and his companions have no choice: they must harden, explore, learn, and sue.\n\n___\n\nOutlaw Players was originally an online comic book published in 2002 before being paused and thought of as \"a succession of anecdotes about online video games, more humor-based which relies on Mechanics of MMOs \". The author, Shonen, therefore had to \"take up the project and reflect on a more coherent framework and concept\" during the series adaptation.\nIn order to keep up with the slower release rate than in Japan, the first four volumes were completed before the series was launched and quarterly planing was put in place for the first six volumes. 1c7a142c-be50-4f6f-ba8b-3494d28b7b5a:::||@!@||:::2024-05-06T01:16:53:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1c7a142c-be50-4f6f-ba8b-3494d28b7b5a","title":{"en":"Bouai Friendship"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"暴愛フレンドシップ"},{"en":"Alone with You"}],"lastChapter":"6.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr"],"description":{"en":"It's Yuzuru's last year of high school, and he still doesn't have any friends. The two opposites are soon drawn to each other as they see that they actually do have some things in common.... A cute high school love story between the popular kid and a \"ghost.\"","fr":"C'est la dernière année de lycée de Yuzuru et il n'a toujours aucun d'amis. En fait, il est presque invisible aux yeux de tous... Les gens qui le remarquent l'appellent même « fontôme». Je veux transmettre mes compétences en rendez-vous à Jeonsu, qui se réveille comme une poupée qu'il aime, change d'humeur et révèle honnêtement toutes ses émotions comme un idiot. \"Essaye, embrasse, apprends.\""},"links":{"mu":"p0ptq1f","raw":"https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6476"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
